name: Space Battle Arcade
description:
A space arcade game that lets you create large scale battles and participate as a small fighter trying to take down the enemy carrier ship.

Ships with full mod support allowing users to create new mods with custom models and user designed levels and campaign level progression. 

Dev blog: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL22CMuqloY0qiYlv1Lm_QtfwuFz9OB0NE

Open source on github (see dev blog)
